basics.name: Ferenc Gozony
basics.label: Visual Designer
basics.summary: Game Artist building worlds through Character and Environment Concept Art and Level Design. Experienced in collaborating with designers and programmers to craft engaging, player-driven experiences. Adept at managing art direction, iterative development, and team direction. Currently pursuing a B.S. in Game Design & Interactive Media at UCI, graduating March 2026.

work.name: BranchOut, Inc.
work.summary: As Lead UI/UX Designer, I led user research by writing interview guides and organizing a team of 7 to conduct interviews identifying target audience, planning challenges, and app feedbackâ€”translating insights into an improved UI flow and better user experience. Additionally, I collaborated with the Founder on system design, interaction loops, and gamification.

work.name: Chronomancy (Game)
work.summary: Acting as Lead Visual Designer, I created character and environment concept art to capture our game's visual style, which was used as reference material for the art and sound team I oversaw (6 people). Additionally, I also developed level designs for our procedurally generated room system, setup our Perforce server, and created a Discord bot to operate it remotely and report commits.

work.name: Gozony Legal Nurse Consulting
work.summary: Assisting in file organization, billing, and advertisement, I prepared case files, invoiced clients and documented receipts on Quickbooks, and created logos, business cards, labels and Word templates, as well as a custom website in Wix (www.gozonylnc.com).

work.name: Project: Ether (Game)
work.summary: Was brought on to help fix critical animation, movement, and texture bugs in game. I mainly fixed issues surrounding Animation Montages, AnimGraph states, and faulty render textures from Blender to Unreal pipeline.

work.name: Convergence (Game)
work.summary: Acting as Lead Artist on this project, I drafted, presented, and implemented all assets for this game from concept to production, mainly working in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

work.name: SECO-LARM, USA.
work.summary: Under mentorship of the Senior Graphic Designer, we worked to produce marketing materials including social media posts (IG, FB, TW/X, Pinterest, Reels/TikTok), web banners, advertisements, and product photos and literature, as well as maintaining an organized system of visual assets for design use.

education.area: Donald Bren School of Information and Computer Sciences (ICS)
education.studyType: B.S in Game Design and Interactive Media

references.name: Christina Bartel
references.reference: Supervisor at Gozony Legal Nurse Consulting

references.name: James Hollifield
references.reference: Senior Graphic Designer for SECO-LARM, USA.
